title: Assessing and Treating Adult ADHD
itunes:title: Assessing and Treating Adult ADHD
description:
Does adult-onset ADHD really exist? This episode discusses the neurobiological underpinnings of adult ADHD. It also describes how to assess adults with ADHD, important considerations, and some management strategies. 

Guest: Oscar Bukstein, M.D. 
Interviewer: Mohan Gautam, D.O. 
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.
